description: Make this chia pudding recipe layered with fresh blueberries and oranges and topped with homemade granola. Perfect for brunch or dessert.
keywords: Parfait,Pescatarian,Orange,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Egg free,Mother's Day,Quick & easy dessert,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Blueberry & Orange Chia Parfait Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place yoghurt, chia seeds and vanilla extract in a bowl and stir until well combined. Stand for 10 minutes to thicken.
Meanwhile, mix blueberries, orange segments and maple syrup in a bowl.
Layer yoghurt mixture and fruit into serving glasses. Chill for 1 hour or until set.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine oats, pepitas and coconut in a bowl. Spread on tray and roast for 10 minutes or until golden. Cool. Sprinkle over desserts and serve.
